events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The customer reported wanting a refund due to receiving an incorrect item, so the case is categorized as Refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request and further communication.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and want to assist with your refund.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the packing slip to verify the order for processing your refund?
I have attached the photos of the wrong product along with the packing slip as you requested for review.
Thanks for the photos. I have approved your refund, and you should see the money returned to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thank you for the quick resolution. I appreciate the prompt refund and your helpful assistance.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you have any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting customer support and have a great day.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
